content.question: A particle moves on the hyperbola <math alttext="x y, equals 15 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for time <math alttext="t is greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>â‰¥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds. At a certain instant, <math alttext="x equals 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="the derivative of x, with respect to t, equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is true about <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at this instant?

choices.label: <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing by 10 units per second.
<math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is increasing by 10 units per second.
<math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing by 5 units per second.
<math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is increasing by 5 units per second.

content.answer: <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing by 10 units per second.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
